#summary Obfuscate the SWC to avoid decompilation.

= Use the CoreAir_secure.swc when compiling =

To avoid decompilation of the AIR application, you can use the obfuscated Actionscript library. Including this library will cause most decompilers to crash. 

[http://s3.amazonaws.com/stratoscreen/CoreAir_secure.swc CoreAir_secure.swc]
